text: Arrissoules is a village of the district Yverdon of the Canton of Vaud, Switzerland. On 1 January 2005 the former municipality of Arrissoules merged into the municipality of Rovray, which kept the name Rovray.Nomenklaturen â€“ Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 4 April 2011 The Arrissoules Tunnel of the A1 motorway is found near the village. == References == Category:2000s disestablishments in Switzerland Category:2005 disestablishments in Europe Category:Former municipalities of Vaud Category:Villages in Vaud
title: Arrissoules
